title: Interview with Dr. Claire Sedgwick
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Claire Sedgwick from the University of Nottingham about her book; Feminist Media: From the second wave to the digital age. Claire also talks about her current research on stand up comedy and the sociological issues which arise from the scene.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
